divs: Sighting Detailswhile re-fueling car, someone said, what the hell is that? Overhead was a huge shiny,"alumin foil" shiny triangle just motionless, and silent. My father and I watched ,along with others for about 10 min., then proceeded on our way to california. As my father drove, I hung my head out the window, and continued watching the object until it seemed to rise ever so slowly until it appeared to be just another star in the night sky. We were both in awe of the sighting, and my father, an ex cdn. air force man, told me we'd just seen a u.f.o.
Summary: Above gas station, hovering at approx. 200ft., multiple witnesses.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Curtis
This sighting has never been favorited.
